description:
Dragul is a former general of the Parthevia Empire. He is part of Parthevia`s Dragul Family, and son of the Parthevian General Draguliel Pertegomidus.
When 1st Dungeon, http://anidb.net/ch80566 [Baal], appeared in Parthevia, the Emperor wanted to obtain its power, since Parthevia was in war against Reim Empire. All the soldiers who were sent to the Dungeon died, and the Emperor decided to send Dragul as well. He recruited more people among the population, with Sinbad among them. Only Dragul and Sinbad managed to reach the Baal`s throne room, where they had a duel in order to decide who will take Baal`s power for himself. In the end, Sinbad won.
He was the first of the Eight Generals to meet http://anidb.net/ch63160 [Sinbad] and the first member of Sinbad`s Household.
Source: Magi Wiki, edited.
name: Dragul Nol Henrius Gobias Medias Partenvonmias Dumid Os Koltanon
